info.title: Sales Order - Simulate (A2X)
info.description: The API gives you information about pricing, material availability, and the customer's credit limit. The response is provided synchronously. The simulated sales order is not saved.

x-sap-shortText: Simulate the creation of a sales order with this synchronous OData API

values.text: [Opportunity-to-Order with Third-Party Sales Force Automation Apps (Deprecated)(1QI)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1QI " Link To BP ")
[B2B Order Fulfillment with SAP Commerce Cloud(2TY)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2TY " Link To BP ")
[SAP Customer Experience Entities with SAP Service and Sales Cloud(6KO)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6KO " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Sales: Sales Document (SD_SALESDOC)
* Sales: Sales Document Item (SD_SALESDOCITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

tags.name: Sales Order Item Pricing Elmnt Sim (API)
Value Added Service for SO Simulation

post.summary: Simulates the creation of a sales order.
post.description: Simulates the creation of a sales order, including price calculation with results, Available-to-Promise (ATP) check, partner determination, and credit check.

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
